title: Ep 74: Take a Pill, Pet a Cat with Kristin Petrovich of Själ Skincare

description:
Get out your crystals! Kristin Petrovich of Själ skincare is here to smooth our skin and help us all feel more grounded. Before that: The "Madonna" facial, color-adjusting makeup, and why it's so annoying when people say, "You look tired."

Become a member at https://plus.acast.com/s/fatmascara.


Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
